definition: texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up
at or in the very same.../suitable/adequate/fitting/proper/to replace/to regard as/to think/to pawn/(coll.) to fail (a student)
to be/to act as/manage/withstand/when/during/ought/should/match equally/equal/same/obstruct/just at (a time or place)/on the spot/right/just at

sentences.english: I think women should accept their traditional role of being housewives.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲婦女理當接管她們傳統的腳色，做家庭婦女。

sentences.english: And by reason hereof he ought, as for the people, so also for himself, to offer for sins.
sentences.chinese: 故此他理當爲百姓和自己獻祭贖罪。

sentences.english: All citizens and organizations shall respect and care for the National Flag.
sentences.chinese: 每個平正易近和組織，都理當尊敬和愛護國旗。

sentences.english: The kitchen is one of the most taken for granted parts of the house.
sentences.chinese: 廚房是其中一個房子的理當如此的部分。

sentences.english: Obey the king's command, I say, because you took an oath before God.
sentences.chinese: 我勸你遵守王的命令，既指神起誓，理當如此。

sentences.english: And rightly so; it’s world famous.
sentences.chinese: 理當如此，因爲它世界馳名。

sentences.english: But the kitchen is one of the most taken for granted parts of the house.
sentences.chinese: 但是廚房是其中一個房子的理當如此的部分。

sentences.english: I was blissful and sure that all things were as they should be.
sentences.chinese: 我是有福的，我確信萬物都理當如此。

sentences.english: This paper introduces a distributed stage suspender control system, which is based on configuration and PLC technology.
sentences.chinese: 舞臺吊杆的控制也理當順應了這一發展趨勢。

sentences.english: Certainly all journalists should aim to be accurate.
sentences.chinese: 所有記者理當以準確爲目標。
